name: Somewhere (Extended Remix)

I'm taking you somewhere
I'm taking you somewhere

Break a silence for a while

where no one can find us

Where I'm from where I'm going
It doesn't matter cause no one cares
Just heart broken the world is

where no one can find us
No more feeling empty No more sorry

I'm taking you somewhere
